name: Time Loop Escape
description:
You are cursed! When you die you get stuck in the time loop, where you see your past self repeating the mistake.

Can you still ESCAPE?
Prove that sometimes dying is rewarded!

## RULES ##
- You must die to get stuck in the time-loop -
- Can't interact with your past self directly -
- To avoid paradox your past self must die -

## CONTROLS ##
- A or Left-arrow and D or Right-arrow to move
- Space or W or Up-Arrow to jump
- ESC to pause

The time travel mechanic is inspired from a flash game called "Chronotron"

Made this game for #weekly-game-jam-130
https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-130
